data.title: companies by number of patents
data.meta_description: Patent Bots Quality Scores are computed using one year of issued patents. See how patent law firms and companies rank for patent quality.
data.text:
Below is a list of companies with at least 50 issued patents over the course of a recent year sorted by the number of issued patents. Click on any company to see more details including the law firms of the company.

The Quality Badges indicate companies that are in the top 10, 25, or 50 of the Patent Bots Quality Score Rankings or in the top 10 for a tech center. Click on any badge to see the rankings.
